name: v0.5.12
body:
## What's Changed
* Add new check to base by @mrodriguezg1991 in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/463
* Support Japanese Reiwa (令和/れいわ) era. by @kaiidams in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/412
* add basic farsi support by @HKalbasi in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/354
* Added Tajik language support by @decherd in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/406
* Fix Amharic language support by @devEyosiyas in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/465
* Fix Hebrew pluralize and implement to_currency by @gs202 in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/330
* [ADD] num2words: add support to translate some currencies in italian language by @primes2h in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/434
* fix Polish twenties by @cyriaka90 in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/345
* add uzs for ru and en by @DogRuz in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/422
* Added support for Esperanto numbers. by @OpesMentis in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/387
* [ADD] to ordinal number for Turkish by @ieski in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/468
* Fix zeroth in Dutch to nulde fixing #325 by @KommuSoft in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/326
* new release by @mrodriguezg1991 in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/475

## New Contributors
* @kaiidams made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/412
* @HKalbasi made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/354
* @decherd made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/406
* @devEyosiyas made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/465
* @gs202 made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/330
* @primes2h made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/434
* @DogRuz made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/422
* @OpesMentis made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/387
* @ieski made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/468
* @KommuSoft made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/326

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/compare/v0.5.11...v0.5.12

name: v0.5.11
body:
## What's Changed
* Add KZT and UAH currencies to lang RU by @satels in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/264
* Add es_NI currency by @williamjmorenor in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/276
* Update .gitignore to add .eggs/ directory by @williamjmorenor in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/280
* Fix Hebrew support by @arielallon in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/289
* Update test_tr.py to increase coverage by @toofun666 in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/298
* Add ordinal 12,345 to ES test suite to increase coverage by @btharper in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/287
* Add simple tests for lang_DK.py by @btharper in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/286
* Add testcase for lang_EN.py by @btharper in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/288
* Add more tests to base.py by @williamjmorenor in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/283
* Fixed misspelling of 21 (cardinal and ordinal number) in IT language by @yliharma in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/270
* Romanian issues 259 by @mariaS210 in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/260
* Adding Language Support for Telugu / Bug Fix in Kannada by @venu1807 in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/263
* Add support of Kazakh language (KZ) by @olzhasar in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/306
* Update README.rst by @sarahberanek in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/307
* Added support for Hungarian language by @maraid in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/310
* [UPD] Readme file by @mromdhane in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/363
* [ADD] num2words: add traslation to spanish of several currencies by @fernandahf in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/356
* added swedish language including test cases by @peternordstrom in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/352
* Remove dupplicated line in lang_PT_BR by @israelst in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/355
* Fix ordinal_num output for Dutch (NL) by @EraYaN in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/369
* Polishordinals by @PaulinaKomorek in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/367
* [tr] return Turkish 0 ordinal and cardinal by @cyriaka90 in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/347
* Improve Ukrainian support and minor fixes in CZ, KZ, LT, LV, PL, RU, SR languages by @rostyslav80 in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/400
* feat: ci: replace travis by github workflows by @mrodriguezg1991 in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/448
* [ES] Added missing accents ("dieciséis", "dólar", "dólares", "veintiún"), improved currency gender handling, fixed pound cent names by @gonsalet in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/443

## New Contributors
* @satels made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/264
* @arielallon made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/289
* @yliharma made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/270
* @venu1807 made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/263
* @olzhasar made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/306
* @maraid made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/310
* @mromdhane made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/363
* @fernandahf made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/356
* @peternordstrom made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/352
* @israelst made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/355
* @EraYaN made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/369
* @PaulinaKomorek made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/367
* @cyriaka90 made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/347
* @rostyslav80 made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/400
* @mrodriguezg1991 made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/448
* @gonsalet made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/443

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/compare/v0.5.10...v0.5.11

name: v0.5.10
body:
## What's Changed
* Release 0.5.9 by @erozqba in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/235
* fix ordinal_num for French numbers ending with 1 by @zenogantner in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/236
* PL: regular names for powers of thousand by @TrangOul in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/233
* German improvements by @zenogantner in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/237
* Convert strings to Decimal values by @btharper in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/223
* Fix typo 'seperator' on source code by @erozqba in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/238
* Updates accents on céntimos in Spanish by @ohduran in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/240
* Multitude of corrections of Slovene language by @bblaz in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/246
* Fixing currency functions for german and french. Adding Currency_Forms for DE, FR and NL. by @sarahberanek in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/247
* Add support for the Indian rupee. by @chintal in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/248
* Revert some copyright changes made in commit 53b4518 by @neysofu in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/254
* add kannada language support by @akki2825 in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/243
* Release v0.5.10 by @eortiz-tracktik in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/255

## New Contributors
* @zenogantner made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/236
* @ohduran made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/240
* @chintal made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/248
* @akki2825 made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/243
* @eortiz-tracktik made their first contribution in https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/pull/255

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/savoirfairelinux/num2words/compare/0.5.9...v0.5.10
New release to fix encoding issue reported by some maintainers for different Linux distributions building and packaging num2words.
